articles.title: Jaylen Brown continues to shine as Celtics hold off furious 76ers run, win third straight: 9 takeaways
articles.description:
The Celtics escaped with a win they deserved but very nearly frittered away.

The post Jaylen Brown continues to shine as Celtics hold off furious 76ers run, win third straight: 9 takeaways appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Celtics secured a victory against the 76ers, marking their third consecutive win.
Jaylen Brown led the team with impressive performance, contributing significantly to the win.
The win boosts Celtics' morale and strengthens their position in the Eastern Conference.
